scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const filesToClean = ['index.html', 'styles.css', 'assets']; const files = fs.readdirSync(__dirname); const htmlFiles = files.filter(f => f.endsWith('.html')); filesToClean.push(...htmlFiles); filesToClean.forEach(file => { try { const filePath = path.join(__dirname, file); const stat = fs.statSync(filePath); if (stat.isDirectory()) { fs.rmSync(filePath, { recursive: true, force: true }); } else { fs.rmSync(filePath, { force: true }); } console.log('Cleaned', file); } catch (error) { /* ignore */ } });"
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
